segments.key_quote: Shraddha is the beginning of Bhakti, real faith in Krishna.
segments.summary: The lecture begins with prayers and then discusses the importance of real faith (Shraddha) in Krishna as the foundation of Bhakti, distinguishing it from mere belief or sentiment.
